column10:
1) The Shogun's army makes camp on a snowy mountain pass.
2) The team infiltrates the camp with a tied up Masaru in tow.
3) Underway, Aiko asks Hayato because there might not be another chance.
4) Hayato tells her that Mugen made him realize why he really joined the team.
5) Hayato never was in it for the money, but because Mugen was a friend to him.
6) Through flawless teamwork the team infiltrates the Shogun's tent.
The team have penetrated the outer layers of the camp and now face the final stretch up the pass to where the Shogun's massive tent is located.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Myōgi Pass
column12: 妙义岭

column10: Wow! So many tents! It's like a city!
column12: 哇！这么多帐篷！连起来就像座城市！

column10: Hmm … full of soldiers with orders to shoot us on sight.
column12: 嗯……到处都是士兵。他们都已收到命令，对我们要格杀勿论了吧。

column10: Yes, giving ourselves up would be pointless. Best to not draw any attention.
column12: 是的，到时候我们就算投降也没有用。注意不要引起任何警觉。

column10: The Shogun's tent is at the very top. No surprise there.
column12: 不出所料，将军的营帐在最顶端。

column10: This entrance is heavily guarded.
column12: 而且入口有重兵把守。

column10: We need a strategy to get inside.
column12: 看来得有好的战略才能进得去。

column10: The guards here seem to enjoy their sake.
column12: 这里的守卫似乎很喜欢喝清酒。

column10: I know a recipe that will help them to sleep.
column12: 我知道有个配方可以让他们入睡。

column10: I still have some ingredients left. All I need is a place to brew.
column12: 我这儿还剩了些材料。只要有个配药台就能把安眠药造出来。

column10: I like the idea.
column12: 这个办法不错。

column10: I could pour your brew into the sake barrel. A disguise would help with this.
column12: 我可以乔装混进军营里，然后把你做的安眠药倒进酒桶里。

column10: There must be a kimono with the Shogun's entourage.
column12: 将军的随从那边肯定有和服。

column10: I could also look for a servant's uniform at that small temple.
column12: 小庙那里也有佣人的衣服。

column10: I see wagons! We could hide inside.
column12: 我看见马车了！我们可以藏在里面。

column10: Maybe they'll carry us to the Shogun. Might be fun yes?
column12: 也许马车就能带我们到将军那儿。好像很好玩。

column10: Indeed … if they don't find us.
column12: 的确……只要不被发现的话。

column10: We have two options then. Either we drug the sake and put the guards to sleep, or we find a wagon that goes to the Shogun's tent.
column12: 也就是说，目前有两种选择。一种是把安眠药倒进酒里让士兵入睡，另一种是混入前往将军营帐的马车上。

column10: It won't be easy either way. Good thing we're up for a challenge.
column12: 两种办法都不简单，好在咱们向来天不怕地不怕。

column10: I'll carry our guest.
column12: 我负责背咱们的“客人”吧。

column10: I agree. Let us begin.
column12: 好的，开始行动吧。

column10: Alternative for Briefing.
column12: Alternative for Briefing.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Myōgi Pass
column12: 妙义岭

column10: Wow! So many tents! It's like a city!
column12: 哇！这么多帐篷！连起来就像座城市！

column10: Mhm … full of soldiers with orders to shoot us on sight.
column12: 嗯……到处都是士兵。他们都已收到命令，对我们要格杀勿论了吧。

column10: Yes, giving ourselves up would be pointless. Best to not draw any attention.
column12: 是的，到时候我们就算投降也没有用。注意不要引起任何警觉。

column10: The Shogun's tent is at the very top. No surprise there then.

column10: I see wagons!
column12: 我看见马车了！

column10: We could hide inside. Let them carry us through.
column12: 可以藏在马车里面，让马车带我们过去。

column10: Hehe, a clever plan, though it pays to have a second option.
column12: 呵呵呵，此法甚妙，但我还有一计。

column10: The guards here seem to enjoy their sake.
column12: 这里的守卫似乎很喜欢喝清酒。

column10: I know a recipe that will put them straight to sleep.
column12: 我知道有个配方可以让他们入睡。

column10: I still have some ingredients left. All I need is a place to brew.
column12: 我这儿还剩了些材料。只要有个配药台就能把安眠药造出来。

column10: I like the idea.
column12: 这个办法不错。

column10: I could pour your brew into the sake barrel. A disguise would help with this.
column12: 我可以乔装混进军营里，然后把你做的安眠药倒进酒桶里。

column10: There are multiple opportunities to acquire one.
column12: 能入手伪装的地方不止一处。

column10: So we have two options. Either we drug the sake and put the guards to sleep, or find a wagon that carries us to the Shogun's tent.
column12: 也就是说，目前有两种选择。一种是把安眠药倒进酒里让士兵入睡，另一种是混入前往将军营帐的马车上。

column10: And then we face our destiny.
column12: 之后就听天由命了。

column10: It is our only hope.
column12: 这是我们最后的希望。

column10: The Shogun will be angry with us …
column12: 将军大人一定会发火吧…

column9:
ALTERNATIVE
if team never met Shogun
column10: We will meet the Shogun …
column12: 终于要见到将军大人了么…

column10: Hayato-san. Will you carry our present for the Shogun?
column12: 隼人兄，为将军准备的“礼物”能交给你来背吗？

column10: I'm ready.
column12: 嗯，没问题。

column10: Very well. Let us begin then.
column12: 很好。开始行动吧。

column10: The team kills one of the Shogun's men.
column12: The team kills one of the Shogun's men.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hrm …
Shhh … I'm sorry … I'm so sorry …
column12: 嘘……对不起……对不起……

column10: … dark times.
column12: ……形势所迫。

column10: It feels wrong, killing our allies, but it cannot be changed. Noboru has forced their deaths upon us.
column12: 杀死友军虽然不对，但也是迫于无奈。一切都是昇害的。

column10: The team kills more of the Shogun's men. At the 10th kill …
column12: The team kills more of the Shogun's men. At the 10th kill …

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hrm … this is not right.
column12: 嗯……这样不好吧。

column10: I'm sorry …
column12: 对不起……

column10: Forgive me …
column12: 请原谅……

column10: Hmm, today's friend, tomorrow's enemy. It cannot be helped.
column12: 哎，今天的朋友就是明天的敌人。我们也别无选择。

column10: The team kills even more of the Shogun's men. At the 20th kill …
column12: The team kills even more of the Shogun's men. At the 20th kill …

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hrm … damn …
column12: 嗯……真该死……

column10: I don't like this …
column12: 我讨厌这样……

column10: Forgive me, friend.
column12: 非常抱歉。

column10: We killed them for our own survival. Judgement falls to the Shogun alone.
column12: 我们也不过是为了自保，一切都交给将军决断吧。

column10: Hayato carries the tied up Masaru around.
column12: Hayato carries the tied up Masaru around.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hrm … I  hope you don't snore.
column12: 嗯……希望他别打呼噜。

column10: Are you getting heavier?
column12: 怎么变重了？

column10: You're heavier than you look.
column12: 比看起来重多了。

column10: How high is this wretched mountain.
column12: 这该死的山到底有多高啊？

column10: Nice and easy.
column12: 慢慢来。

column10: Up we go …
column12: 往上走…

column10: The old man really did put you to sleep.
column12: …老爷子的安眠药也太有效了吧？

column10: Yuki drags the tied up Masaru around.
column12: Yuki drags the tied up Masaru around.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Urgh ... he's heavy!
column12: 呜……好重……

column10: Urgh ... Hayato-san, why can't you do it?
column12: 呜……隼人师父，你怎么不来背呢？

column10: Urgh … too slow, too slow …
column12: 呃……好慢，太慢了……

column10: Aiko drags the tied up Masaru around.
column12: Aiko drags the tied up Masaru around.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: No, this is too slow.
column12: 不行，这样太慢了。

column10: I should leave this to Hayato-san.
column12: 应该交给隼人兄来搬。

column10: This won't do.
column12: 这样下去不行。

column10: The team discovers a place where a wagon is loaded before it heads up to the small temple.
column12: The team discovers a place where a wagon is loaded before it heads up to the small temple.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hmm ... is that the wagon we need?
column12: 这辆是我们要找的马车吗？

column10: Yes, there's a wagon … but is it the right one?
column12: 看，是马车…不过，这辆对吗?

column10: Ah, I see a wagon, but I doubt it is the one we need.
column12: 啊，看到马车了。但好像不是我们需要的那辆。

column10: This wagon is not heading for the Shogun's tent. It can only carry us up the mountain to that small temple.
column12: 这辆马车不是前往将军营帐的。只能带我们到山上小庙那里。

column10: The wagon driver stops briefly to talk with a guard.
column12: The wagon driver stops briefly to talk with a guard.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Any trouble ahead?
column12: 前面有异常吗？

column10: All's quiet.
column12: 风平浪静。

column10: I'm heading for the temple.
column12: 我这车是去寺庙的。

column10: Your wagon will be inspected then.
column12: 那就让我们检查一下。

column10: Ah, same as always.
column12: 哎呀，就还是那几样货。

column10: Go on. On your way.
column12: 去吧，快走。

column10: A samurai halts the wagon driver to inspect the wagon.
column12: A samurai halts the wagon driver to inspect the wagon.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hold up! We must inspect your cargo.
column12: 停车!让我们检查一下货物。

column10: Sure. Go ahead.
column12: 当然可以，您请便。

column10: It'll only take a moment.
column12: 很快的。

column10: A samurai discovers a team member in the back of the wagon.
column12: A samurai discovers a team member in the back of the wagon.

column10: o
column12: o2

column10: Someone's hiding in the wagon! Intruders!
column12: 有人藏在马车里!有刺客!

column10: The team discovers a small temple where the Shogunate men load wagons before they are sent directly to the Shogun's tent.
column12: The team discovers a small temple where the Shogunate men load wagons before they are sent directly to the Shogun's tent.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Must be harsh, living up here at the temple.
column12: 住在这种山上的庙里，一定很辛苦。

column10: The temple ... it looks so peaceful.
column12: 是寺庙……看起来真祥和啊。

column10: This temple ... at least the Shogunate army respects the inhabitants.
column12: 这个寺庙……看来幕府军对庙里的人还算尊重。

column10: The wagon that's loaded here is heading for the Shogun's tent. It might be our chance.
column12: 在这里装货的马车会前往将军的营帐。可以利用这个机会。

column10: The team goes near the crowd of drinking soldiers.
column12: The team goes near the crowd of drinking soldiers.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: There's no chance we'll get through there.
column12: 这里是完全不可能通过的吧。

column10: No, no not there! They'll see us!
column12: 不行！不行，不能走这边！肯定会被看到的!

column10: Even in disguise, I would not be able to pass through this crowd.
column12: 即使乔装，我也无法混过这群人。

column10: They cannot spot us if they are fast asleep.
column12: 但如果让他们睡着，就不会发现我们了。

column9: if poison has not been brewed
column10: Then let us find a place where you can brew the sleeping draught.
column12: 先找个能调制安眠药的地方吧。

column10: You made the sleeping draught. I will put on a disguise and add it to the sake barrel.
column12: 安眠药已经准备好了。让我乔装一下，把药倒进清酒桶里。

column10: Guards sit at the campfire near the Shogun's tent. They drink sake and talk.
column12: Guards sit at the campfire near the Shogun's tent. They drink sake and talk.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Damn the traitors.
column12: 该死的叛徒。

column10: They deserve it, they murdered the heir to the Shogunate.
column12: 是啊，他们竟敢杀害将军的继承人。

column10: I still can't believe it.
column12: 我还是不敢相信。

column10: They will not escape justice!
column12: 正义必将制裁他们！

column10: Wonder where they're hiding.
column12: 他们到底藏在哪里？

column10: What is Kage-sama up to?
column12: 影大人在干什么？

column10: We must protect the Shogun!
column12: 必须保护好将军!

column10: I never thought I'd ever lay eyes on the emperor.
column12: 从没想过我还能到京都保卫天皇。

column10: The road to Kyoto is so long.
column12: 去京都的路真是漫长。

column10: Sake!
column12: 上酒！

column10: Sake!
column12: 上酒！

column10: Sake!
column12: 上酒！

column10: Takuma brews a very strong liquid. Aiko can slip this into sake barrels to make the crowd of drinking soldiers harmless.
column12: Takuma brews a very strong liquid. Aiko can slip this into sake barrels to make the crowd of drinking soldiers harmless.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hehe, a potent concoction. This can put the men at the campfire to sleep.
column12: 呵呵呵，强效安眠药完成了。能让篝火旁的那群士兵都睡着。

column10: Let me carry the flask. I can put on a disguise and pour this into the sake barrel.
column12: 安眠药就交给我吧。我先乔装混进去，然后把药倒进酒清桶里。

column10: Aiko pours Takuma's brew into the sake barrels.
column12: Aiko pours Takuma's brew into the sake barrels.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: There … let us wait until the serving maids do their part.
column12: 好了...就等佣人给他们上酒了。

column10: The wagon driver stops briefly to talk with a guard.
column12: The wagon driver stops briefly to talk with a guard.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hmn … sake …
column12: 嗯…酒…

column10: Hmhm … kehehehe …
column12: 嗯…哈哈哈哈...

column10: Hhn? Uhm … never mind …
column12: 嗯？啊…没什么…

column10: Hayato carries Masaru halfway to the Shogun's tent.
column12: Hayato carries Masaru halfway to the Shogun's tent.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I thank you for your trust, Hayato-san. I admit, I was unsure whether you would stay with us.
column12: 谢谢你的信任，隼人兄。说实话，我之前一直不敢确定你是否会参加这次行动。

column10: Please, don't mention it.
column12: 别和我说这些。

column10: Forgive me, but I am curious. Was this ever about payment? Part of me wonders if there is not another reason.
column12: 抱歉，但我还是很好奇。你仅仅只是为了拿佣金吗？我总觉得还另有原因。

column10: Heh … you know, Mugen asked me the same thing.
column12: 呵……无限也问过我这个问题。

column10: Did you have an answer for him?
column12: 你回答了吗？

column10: Not back then.
column12: 那时候，并没有回答他。

column10: Hayato has carried Masaru to the Shogun's tent.
column12: Hayato has carried Masaru to the Shogun's tent.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: We're almost at the end, Hayato-san. Will you tell me why you did all this? Why you entered Mugen's service? Why you are still with us?
column12: 是时候回答我了，隼人兄。你所做的一切都是为什么？为什么当初要帮助无限？为什么现在还和我们在一起？

column10: Maybe I just liked helping out a friend. And now, well … now it's personal.
column12: 一开始或许只是想帮朋友一把。至于现在……完全是因为我想报仇。

column10: But why fight with us now? Why not seek vengeance on your own?
column12: 那为什么愿同我们一起？为什么不独自去寻仇？

column10: Because you were right. It's not about me. It's about what Mugen would want.
column12: 因为你说的对，我不是为自己复仇，而是要以无限所希望看到的方式，为他讨回公道。

column10: I thank you, Hayato-san.
column12: 谢谢你，隼人兄。

column10: Just like I said. Don't mention it.
column12: 我说过了，别和我说这些。

column10: The team is almost at the Shogun's tent.
column12: The team is almost at the Shogun's tent.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ooh, his tent is huge!
column12: 哇！好大的帐篷！

column10: This is our destination.
column12: 这里就是我们的目的地。

column10: The moment of truth draws near.
column12: 揭晓真相的时刻即将来临。

column10: Better make sure we have Masaru before we go in.
column12: 进去前最好确认下真申在不在。
NINJA

column10: MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
